title: REDice
author: REDice
content: we sew all type of costume, wedding, and american suit. i will accept bitcoin payment.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Yeah yeah, you did this and that. How about shows us your previous works in a form of images or videos so people can see what's the quality of the work you did. I knew this looks new service posted in this forum, so having a client from here might looks like implausible but who knows. Also include you contacts, location, and etc. about your service.

comments.author: REDice
comments.body: Quote from: PX-Z on January 26, 2023, 04:05:30 AMYeah yeah, you did this and that. How about shows us your previous works in a form of images or videos so people can see what's the quality of the work you did. I knew this looks new service posted in this forum, so having a client from here might looks like implausible but who knows. Also include you contacts, location, and etc. about your service.Here the pic of my work https://imgur.com/a/eHvhNZ0 and also offered in GCASH cash in or cashout in my local service most Bridal Gown.  all type of Costumes

comments.author: shasan
comments.created_time: January 26, 2023, 07:47:07 AMLast edit: January 26, 2023, 08:24:54 AM by shasan
comments.body: Quote from: REDice on January 26, 2023, 06:01:07 AMHere the pic of my work https://imgur.com/a/eHvhNZ0 and also offered in GCASH cash in or cashout in my local service most Bridal Gown.  all type of CostumesI have edited your link to Jpeg format and quoted that so that it can be seen directly without opening your link and it seems the two images are the same. Anyway, your work is good but it will be better if you add a few more and add on the first post. Also if you have bitcoin or you can arrange bitcoin then you will be able to post images yourself.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Op, I know this might be very hard for you to do but the best way to present such service is to have some video clips and saved it to your Dropbox then get the link and paste here. I think that would really display how beautiful your work looks, having only 2 images without proper address your business may not attract customer. What are your targeted area, location and country. What are the min and max amount, and possibly dropped an email if you don't want to drop a phone line or twitter page, even facebook page will be more appreciated.

comments.author: jayce
comments.body: I was thinking about costumes for halloween and cosplay thing when I saw your thread title  However those are great dresses, if you can show more that would be awesome.

comments.author: REDice
comments.body: Quote from: jayce on January 26, 2023, 11:12:31 AMI was thinking about costumes for halloween and cosplay thing when I saw your thread title  However those are great dresses, if you can show more that would be awesome.give me the design we will make it for you. . .

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: REDice on January 26, 2023, 11:25:16 AMQuote from: jayce on January 26, 2023, 11:12:31 AMI was thinking about costumes for halloween and cosplay thing when I saw your thread title  However those are great dresses, if you can show more that would be awesome.give me the design we will make it for you. . .So, your design is attracting us. Now you should mention your rate, production capacity, and more sample if you have any. You can post more designs on this forum or you can upload them on google drive, dropbox or somewheree you feel comfortable. And in this way it will be helpful for you as well as who need these types of costumes.

comments.author: bnbstorm
comments.body: Quote from: REDice on January 26, 2023, 03:46:19 AMwe sew all type of costume, wedding, and american suit. i will accept bitcoin payment. I would appreciate such kind of hard workers that are aware enough to accept bitcoin. Good luck. Hope you get lot of orders.Beware of scams in this space.

comments.author: jayce
comments.body: Quote from: shasan on January 26, 2023, 11:56:55 AMQuote from: REDice on January 26, 2023, 11:25:16 AMQuote from: jayce on January 26, 2023, 11:12:31 AMI was thinking about costumes for halloween and cosplay thing when I saw your thread title  However those are great dresses, if you can show more that would be awesome.give me the design we will make it for you. . .So, your design is attracting us. Now you should mention your rate, production capacity, and more sample if you have any. You can post more designs on this forum or you can upload them on google drive, dropbox or somewheree you feel comfortable. And in this way it will be helpful for you as well as who need these types of costumes.+1Quote from: REDice on January 26, 2023, 11:25:16 AMgive me the design we will make it for you. . .No offense but how can we trust your service? You are missing plenty things to be explained, especially the shipment details. Perhaps the shipment fee could be higher than the product's price itself.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Btw, no location yet from op to know about the shipping fee and in details of his services. One more question I have to ask, is op really ready to expand his business?Because I can see lots of contributions on how to further expand his services and let people view more of their design instead op keeps skipping those questions rather asking for the design so he/she could make the dress for you.I don't think this is a pure service and no signs of seriously.I will skip this thread now.

comments.author: REDice

One more question I have to ask, is op really ready to expand his business?Because I can see lots of contributions on how to further expand his services and let people view more of their design instead op keeps skipping those questions rather asking for the design so he/she could make the dress for you.I don't think this is a pure service and no signs of seriously.I will skip this thread now.i will add some costume or american suit today Here my new upload costume, bridal gown,  and American suit https://imgur.com/a/0xt6TCz you can view this.Quote from: Adbitco on January 27, 2023, 06:44:09 PMBtw, no location yet from op to know about the shipping fee and in details of his services. comments.author: virasog
comments.body: Quote from: REDice on January 26, 2023, 03:46:19 AMwe sew all type of costume, wedding, and american suit. i will accept bitcoin payment. Don't know if i dare to ask but it will be good if you can tell that you offer Customes only for females or deal in gents suits too ?The reason i am asking this as your sample pictures only contains female stuff.Quote from: jayce on January 26, 2023, 05:16:26 PMNo offense but how can we trust your service? You are missing plenty things to be explained, especially the shipment details. Perhaps the shipment fee could be higher than the product's price itself.We now know that OP location is Philippines but still there are too much things to consider. The first is the size and the texture of the clothes and what is the return policy. I prefer to buy clothes physically otherwise there is always some fitting problem.

comments.author: Mpamaegbu
comments.body: Quote from: shasan on January 26, 2023, 07:47:07 AMI have edited your link to Jpeg format and quoted that so that it can be seen directly without opening your link and it seems the two images are the same.Thanks for going through that stress and quoting for visibility. Perhaps OP should've bought a Copper membership do they can easily display images on their own. That won't cost an arm or leg. I think it's around $30 to get it and they will be free from image issues. Quote from: bnbstorm on January 26, 2023, 12:18:42 PMBeware of scams in this space.You're right. That will be OP's greatest hurdle to cross at this moment, seeing that their account is barely a month old here and they're already advertising a service to the community. I ain't saying that OP isn't genuine but they've to prove that on their own.
